channel.title: Basics on XLabs
channel.description: Recent content in Basics on XLabs

item.title: Project Structure
item.description: This guide will show you how a Doks project is organized and what the different files in your project do.

item.title: Authoring Content
item.description: Doks supports the full range of Markdown syntax in .md files as well as frontmatter YAML, TOML, or JSON to define metadata such as a title and description.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Shortcodes let you easily reuse a piece of UI or styling consistently. Examples might include a callout or a video embed.

item.title: Navigation
item.description: Sidebar A well-organized sidebar is key to a good documentation as it is one of the main ways users will navigate your site.
